website_summaries.verdict: Great starter kit for younger users and casual hobbyists. Does not have the sensitivity of other models, but will still discriminate between valuable metals and junk.
cons: Does not feature a pinpoint function
Must be protected from harsher weather/elements

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner's model, this detector is perfect. It offers a host of unique features and it is well suited for someone who is just becoming involved in such a hobby. The use of high-quality materials, a lightweight feel and an ergonomic design round out the benefits. I am also very happy to state that I have already found a host of coins and other items. Considering that I have only had this detector for two months, I could not be happier. I would definitely recommend this unit to anyone who is looking for a cost-effective and yet powerful metal detector.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great Metal Detector for starting out
customer_reviews.text: PRO:Great Metal Detector for starting out. worked good at the beach easy to use and assembly. Audible signals are extreemly clear on coin and jewelry targets CON:: Never let internal parts get exposed to the elements, must be kept dry and dust free.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Novello

customer_reviews.title: Beginner, likes her first metal detector
customer_reviews.text: Hi, just opened and put together. Took about 15 min . Fairly easy to assemble. Was reading instructions s , when family member "jumped the gun" and took it outside without finishing g instructions . Within minutes found a nail, a piece of tin trash, and an old triangular piece of iron . That's without knowing anything! Just read instructions and will go back outside and try again! I really like it and am very excited to "treasure hunt" on my four acres! Great product with my limited knowledge and experience for under $200.00!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Paquette /Scott Southworth

customer_reviews.title: Good first metal detector
customer_reviews.text: Nice little device, works very well for me. It's not supposed to be used near salt water, but I had it on the beach in NH and was finding things (mostly pieces of lobster traps) fairly well, even in damp sand. It went a little nuts near the salt water. Haven't found anything great yet, but it keeps me busy at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: toria82

customer_reviews.title: Works 80% of the time
customer_reviews.text: Detects a good amount of traces correctly but also 20% of the time it doesn't and you find there to be absolutely nothing. That can be frustrating, especially if you just spent 30 minutes digging up dirt like the movie "Holes" just to left without any reward...not even a small one.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for it's price range
customer_reviews.text: Great for it's price range. Easy to use. Quite effective. I do wish that it had a pinpointing function like the Ace 300 but a handheld pointer solves that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Fulwood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This detector works great love the ear phones makes it easy to locate items
customer_reviews.author: Red Mare

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Detector arrived fast well boxed. Extremely easy to assemble batteries were included. Very lightweight for carrying , display is easy to understand I plan on using the detector this weekend very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Rose.

customer_reviews.title: Missing headphones
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine today I was excited to get it open and set up. There are no headphones and the coils is super loose. I tried to contact seller I just got a return option. I just want the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Oria

customer_reviews.title: GREAT metal detector for beginners 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: Awsome Awsome Awsome I luv my Garrett ace 200 it was well worth the money I’ve had it like 2 months now and already found gold ring and silver jewelry and even some civil war era 3 ringer bullets 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼 I would strongly recommend for beginner Detectors..
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Saucillo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and easy to understand and use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to get started in metal detecting. I haven't been able to get out with it much due to weather but it didn't take long to familiarize myself with it and understand it. I can't wait for the weather to warm up soon and take it out again. Update: it works really well, I took it down to the river and it gets it pretty close to the object but it was difficult to find everything I detected, so I purchased a pinpoint detector but haven't had a chance to take it out yet. I am still very happy with this detector.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Bunton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product has met it's description. It's light enough to use without having to take a break. It's depth was greater than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mersdorf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice, if you want a bargain
customer_reviews.text: This detector will find you a tub full of relics !!! Excellent choice, if you want a bargain price
customer_reviews.author: a. g. johnston

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Works good but too many regulations about where they can be used.
customer_reviews.author: Laversa Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Having a great time.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for a beginner. Simple to use and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Rappopo

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the extension
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with the extension so I called the company and asked for a manual and a replacement part. I received the manual but not the replacement part. I finally got the extension to release so I could complete the assembly. The unit seems to work ok.
customer_reviews.author: Willie L. Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Even detects, wood, air, human, stone
customer_reviews.text: This thing goes off everywhere. Wood, air, stone, human, metal. This is real junk I hope it was a defective one. I'm sending this worthless garbage back. I hope the other one isn't as horrible
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mirra

customer_reviews.title: Spot On!
customer_reviews.text: Husband purchased this to help locate tools and parts strewn across a hay field after a storm blew down two large buildings. He found it to work well and easy to operate. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: karen h

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great detector!. Haved used various models over the years, this Garrett is easy to use, sensitive enough and great for the beginner to advanced digger. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a new roof put on my house. I first used a rolling magnet to pick up roofing tacks and nails. With the metal detector, I found many hidden in the grass and in the flower beds around the house. Now I am ready to find some real treasure!
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Hentzelman

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as I was wanting to get into metal detecting. Easy to put together and operate. The first time I used it I found two civil war artifacts.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use reliable my grandkids love it and its durable. Ive bought two of these.
customer_reviews.author: Vernice

customer_reviews.title: Headphone in cheap
customer_reviews.text: Headphone in cheap. The wire was cut when delivered. The Detector works great.
customer_reviews.author: scott kelley

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly Metal Detector big hit with Eight year old!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my eight year old son for Christmas. It was easy to assemble and set up and he was put with on Christmas Day! So many cool features and he has taken to taking it out in the yard by himself. Looking forward to the spring thaw for even better hunting!
customer_reviews.author: Film buff in NY

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t given it yet it’s a Christmas gift but the box is all beat up and honestly making me nervous that the product will be the same!
customer_reviews.author: Rochele

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his birthday and he loves it. He uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great starter bundle!! Easy to use and tons of fun!! Well made too.
customer_reviews.author: DrMarioPepper

customer_reviews.title: Did not get what I paid for!
customer_reviews.text: Product seams to be good and as advertised on problem with products. Seller on the other hand advertised as having headlights upon opening there were no headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Daulton

customer_reviews.title: It seems well made
customer_reviews.text: So far I haven’t found my fortune but love the anticipation. Just got it but I see many adventures in my future.
customer_reviews.author: sharon Feathers

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Daughter bought this. She loves it. Found a few coins on the beach and some other metal objects.
customer_reviews.author: m_bnielsen

customer_reviews.title: worst detector I ever owned. depth indicator is very inacurate and impossible to x spot
customer_reviews.text: Its light weight that's all I can say about it. I regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Baker

customer_reviews.title: Don.t work
customer_reviews.text: I was very dissapointed in this product, it would not fine a dime, penny, nothing. I tried several new batters
customer_reviews.author: Baseball King

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Still learning how to use it but it did pass a few test runs on known targets at different depths. Glad I chose to spend the extra money to get the brand vs a cheaper one and can’t wait to hit a beach some where
customer_reviews.author: David otten

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality machine
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, quick delivery. This was a gift for my significant other and she loved it! It’s perfect for a beginner or intermediate user. She’s already used it at a local park and found a treasure trove of bottle caps, pull tabs and antique nails😀
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: buy it
customer_reviews.text: But it, you won't be disappointed...unless you're are not new to the hobby then I suggest you go up a few pay ranges.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works good.  Nice screen easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: Works everytime. We found survey rods buried on land. located pipes and went treasure hunting. Found a few coins and old farm tools. Nice buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Surbaugh

customer_reviews.title: A gift for a 9 year old for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: A perfect gift. The 9 year old uses the metal detector frequently and looks forward to using it at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: practice with different items
customer_reviews.text: lite weight, easy to assemble takes a little practice to distinguish different items
customer_reviews.author: paul szarowicz

customer_reviews.title: This metal detector has met my needs. I’m new ...
customer_reviews.text: This metal detector has met my needs. I’m new to it all but it found me several quarters and even a ring the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If your using if just for fun very much worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy a pinpointer too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift to my wife. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like Garrett It's dependable and it really suits my needs good starter.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Tapley

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend. He put it together in no time and started using it right away. He loves it and can't wait to use it this weekend on our weekend trip to the mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J.

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and grandson use this all the time. We did end up buying the pointer later on.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn2671

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift which was a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Looks like child’s toy
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Looks like a child’s toy. Came unsealed and open upon delivery. Unsure if we received everything. I would not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it in a "test" mode to recognize the display and sounds and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: daddy-o

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable hobby
customer_reviews.text: Having fun finding things and for the price well worth getting as a starter.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Hunting for treasures
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 12 year old grandson and he loves it ....he used it Christmas day and I now have several holes in my yard lol hunting for treasures...I wanted to get him outside again and this is just what it took to do the job....thank you...
customer_reviews.author: Staciew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a beginner like me simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Terry Lee Payton II

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this gift and cannot wait to use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... first metal detector and so far everything is working great. Its easy to use and seems to be ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's first metal detector and so far everything is working great. Its easy to use and seems to be pretty sensitive in finding objects. We'' be putting it to the test this week in the mountains and next month at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Frank L Ducar

customer_reviews.title: Garrett ACE 200 Metl Detector
customer_reviews.text: this was a Christmas gift and was loved. she went out and used it soon after opening it.
customer_reviews.author: SaLarr

product_meta.title: Garrett ACE 200 Metal Detector with Waterproof Search Coil and Treasure Sound Headphone
product_meta.description:
Size:ACE 200 w/ HeadphoneGarrett ACE 200 Metal Detector with 6.5" x 9" Waterproof Coil, Garrett Treasure Sound Headphones, Instruction Manual, Batteries and a Two-Year Warranty. 

With the quality and performance of the ACE 200, you can begin finding treasure right away, in your own backyard or wherever you travel. 

This lightweight, easy to use metal detector is ideal for Coin Hunting, Dry Beach Hunting and Fresh Water Hunting. 

With the quality and performance of the ACE 200, you can begin finding treasure right away, in your own backyard or wherever you travel. Easy to use for any age!
feature_bullets: Garrett ACE 200 Metal Detector with 6.5" x 9" Waterproof Coil, Garrett Treasure Sound Headphones, Instruction Manual, Batteries, and a Two-Year Warranty
New Digital Target ID: 0 to 99 scale offers target information
New Camlocks for increased stem stability
New Includes Pulse-Width Modulation audio: sharper, more responsive audio
Light weight with big performance at a small price

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars229 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
